reviews.review_msg: Prof Shen was awesome I would totally take another class with him. He often used real-world examples that actually made the subject a lot more digestible.

SICK PROF!!!!!!!!! GREAT LECTURES, EXPLAINS CONCEPTS TREMENDOUSLY WELL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! CARES ABOUT STUDENTS, EASY TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT WITH HIM OUTSIDE OF CLASS!!!!!!!! LEGEND IN MY BOOK!!!!!!!!!!! WHADDAGUY!!!!!!!!!!!!!

good prof, very knowledgeable and teaches content well. not 5/5 because he drops random exam hints in almost every class and he doesn't record his lectures, so lecture attendance is mandatory. he didn't give any review material for exams but i'd say most exam questions were pretty fair
By far the best lectures I've attended in any econ class class. Will gets straight to the point and is very transparent about what you need to know and how to succeed in his class. goated prof.

Econ105 was enjoyable with William. He was down to earth and genuinely cared for students' success. However, he deviated from course material too much at times. If it were not for test hints he provided in lecture, I probably wouldn't have gone to class much. Overall, exams were fair (all MC) and relatively easy. I recomend taking a class with him.
If you can get into Wills class, one of the best profs out there. Very interesting lectures that are very real world applicable not just reading off the slides.

Hello Professor this is John. For anyone wondering William Shen is a fantastic prof. His lectures are engaging and dynamic. He tells you exactly what you need to study for on the test, and is always happy to answer any questions. I would 100% take his course again and everyone should as well.

William is the best professor ever. He is very fashionable and knows how to make his lectures interesting so you actually have the motivation to attend his classes. He is also very knowledgeable about the stock market. He sends me weekly emails updating me on his trades so that I can copy his trades. So far I'm up $127k from copying his trades.
